00047         public static Bitmap DrawRoundedRectangle(Bitmap Image, Color BoxColor, int XPosition, int YPosition,
00048             int Height, int Width, int CornerRadius)
00049         {
00050             System.Drawing.Bitmap TempBitmap = Image;
00051             System.Drawing.Bitmap NewBitmap = new System.Drawing.Bitmap(TempBitmap, TempBitmap.Width, TempBitmap.Height);
00052             System.Drawing.Graphics NewGraphics = System.Drawing.Graphics.FromImage(NewBitmap);
00053             
00054             Pen BoxPen = new Pen(BoxColor);
00055             GraphicsPath Path = new GraphicsPath();
00056             Path.AddLine(XPosition + CornerRadius, YPosition, XPosition + Width - (CornerRadius * 2), YPosition);
00057             Path.AddArc(XPosition + Width - (CornerRadius * 2), YPosition, CornerRadius * 2, CornerRadius * 2, 270, 90);
00058             Path.AddLine(XPosition + Width, YPosition + CornerRadius, XPosition + Width, YPosition + Height - (CornerRadius * 2));
00059             Path.AddArc(XPosition + Width - (CornerRadius * 2), YPosition + Height - (CornerRadius * 2), CornerRadius * 2, CornerRadius * 2, 0, 90);
00060             Path.AddLine(XPosition + Width - (CornerRadius * 2), YPosition + Height, XPosition + CornerRadius, YPosition + Height);
00061             Path.AddArc(XPosition, YPosition + Height - (CornerRadius * 2), CornerRadius * 2, CornerRadius * 2, 90, 90);
00062             Path.AddLine(XPosition, YPosition + Height - (CornerRadius * 2), XPosition, YPosition + CornerRadius);
00063             Path.AddArc(XPosition, YPosition, CornerRadius * 2, CornerRadius * 2, 180, 90);
00064             Path.CloseFigure();
00065             NewGraphics.DrawPath(BoxPen, Path);
00066             NewGraphics.Dispose();
00067             return NewBitmap;
00068         }
00069 
00070         #endregion
00071     }
